author: Andrew Joseph
title: Mark Wahlberg, 2 Chainz and so many celebrities are attending Super Bowl 51 | For The Win
text:
Mark Wahlberg, 2 Chainz and so many celebrities are attending Super Bowl 51 Mark Wahlberg, 2 Chainz and so many celebrities are attending Super Bowl 51 By Andrew Joseph February 5, 2017 6:32 pm Follow @andyj0seph shares 
The Super Bowl is the biggest sporting event of the year, which makes it a popular destination for celebrities. And of course, the Falcons and Patriots had their own contingency of famous people at Houston for Super Bowl 51. Mark Wahlberg Mark J. Rebilas-USA TODAY Sports Usher (Photo by Kevin C. Cox/Getty Images) Dan Powers-USA TODAY Sports (Photo by Mike Ehrmann/Getty Images) 2 Chainz (Photo by Gregory Shamus/Getty Images) Simone Biles Mark J. Rebilas-USA TODAY Sports Harry Connick Jr. Photo by Jamie Squire/Getty Images Yao Ming
